category.name: Thin Client
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MfgValidationTestFramework_Client_EP_WI_ValidationTestTypes
preference.preference_description: Defines the validation test types this client can handle. The format of this preference is as follows: "MfgValidationTestFramework_Client_<ClientIdentifier>_ValidationTestTypes" This preference needs to be an entry in the preference: "MfgValidationTestFramework_Clients". Each entry is a Manufacturing Validation Test Type that this client can present and handle. Each entry must match the -type argument used during the 'install_callback' for a Validation Test Suite. Required if specified in "MfgValidationTestFramework_Clients".
